subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer advanced to the semifinals at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Andy Roddick, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4. He will face Novak Djokovic, who beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-3, 6-4.
snippet: Roger Federer advanced to the semifinals at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Andy Roddick, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4. He will face Novak Djokovic, who beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-3, 6-4.
